snippet: Since the conventions we've been in something of a waiting game, watching to see whether Mr. Obama's numbers hold their current position or if Mitt Romney can make gains as the days leading to Nov. 6 slip by.
abstract: Since the conventions we've been in something of a waiting game, watching to see whether Mr. Obama's numbers hold their current position or if Mitt Romney can make gains as the days leading to Nov. 6 slip by.

headline.main: Sept. 16: Watching the Clock and Awaiting the Unknown
